SENT.plain: The authors describe a case of retinal artery occlusion; succeeding to a carotid angiography
The ethiology could be a manifestation of an embolic phenomenas
The case is discussed in the light of simular and others reports of ocular complication following this procedure in the literature
Its appears that carotid artery disease was a precipitating factor in the ocular complication
It looks like a complication of injection of the contrast dye in some cases secondary to allergic, toxic or physical phenomenas
